channel.title: Comments on: So I’m using my friends account I’ve downloaded fifa 22 and MW but it allows me to play MW but fifa it has a lock why

item.title: By: THE_WELSHY
item.dc:creator: THE_WELSHY
item.description: Update licenses, fifa 22 works on share play cause that’s how I play it
item.content:encoded: Update licenses, fifa 22 works on share play cause that’s how I play it

item.title: By: Rondragon
item.dc:creator: Rondragon
item.description: For FiFa 22,he has it available via EA Play, only his account has access to it. I guess because its new. Its only playable for 10hrs
item.content:encoded: For FiFa 22,he has it available via EA Play, only his account has access to it. I guess because its new. Its only playable for 10hrs

item.title: By: denilson5888
item.dc:creator: denilson5888
item.description: Do u have his account as primary?
item.content:encoded: Do u have his account as primary?

item.title: By: Killstrong
item.dc:creator: Killstrong
item.description: Its a pre download and will likely be unlocked and ready to go when it is released assuming you have a valid license for the game.
item.content:encoded: Its a pre download and will likely be unlocked and ready to go when it is released assuming you have a valid license for the game.

item.title: By: crywoof
item.dc:creator: crywoof
item.description: Set your friends account as the primary PS4 and log into your account, it should work then. If not try doing a hard restart.
item.content:encoded: Set your friends account as the primary PS4 and log into your account, it should work then. If not try doing a hard restart.

item.title: By: Valuable-Yesterday13
item.dc:creator: Valuable-Yesterday13
item.description: Yes I have his account as primary
item.content:encoded: Yes I have his account as primary

item.title: By: Valuable-Yesterday13
item.dc:creator: Valuable-Yesterday13
item.description: I’ve done that it’s not working

item.title: By: Academic-Cookie6487
item.dc:creator: Academic-Cookie6487
item.description:
Only 2 solutions I can think of
- your friends account is not primary account on your PS4 (it will still let u download mw but will have lock when finished downloading )
-your friend only had the 10 hour trial of fifa (if he has bought fifa you might have to update game license as it’s still considered as the 10 hour trial )
item.content:encoded:
Only 2 solutions I can think of

– your friends account is not primary account on your PS4 (it will still let u download mw but will have lock when finished downloading )

-your friend only had the 10 hour trial of fifa (if he has bought fifa you might have to update game license as it’s still considered as the 10 hour trial )
